page.title: 12 MUSIC
page.content: Music is something that we all enjoy. In school we learn how to play the recorder,the violin and the viola.We sing and listen to music in our daily assemblies,learn more about music in our radio programmes or music lessons. Music has a special place in important school events,e.g.assemblies and presentation days.Out of school we listen to tapes and records-usually popular music, but some classical too.Most of us have a music centre (a morderd hi-fi)at home which we regulary use.5O% of us learn to play musical instruments such as the piano, guitar,drums,keyboard,brass instruments,and organ.
